SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface ReplenishManageInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReplenishManageUI
public interface ReplenishManageInterface
This interface defines methods related to managing replenish requests for inventory. It includes functionality for viewing replenish requests, adding and managing replenishes, and submitting replenish requests for approval or processing.

The methods in this interface are intended to be implemented by classes that provide functionality for managing the replenishment of inventory, including interacting with pharmacists and inventory management systems.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addReplenish(Scanner sc, Medicine medicineName)
    Adds a new replenish request for a specific medicine.
    void
    manageReplenish(Scanner sc)
    Manages the replenish requests, allowing for review and processing of the requests.
    void
    submitReplenish(Scanner sc, Pharmacist pharmacist, ReplenishManageInterface replenishManageInterface, InvenManageInterface invenManageInterface)
    Submits a replenish request for approval or further processing.
    void
    viewReplenishRequest()
    Displays the current replenish requests that need to be processed.

  • Method Details

    • viewReplenishRequest

      void viewReplenishRequest()
      Displays the current replenish requests that need to be processed.

    • addReplenish

      void addReplenish(Scanner sc, Medicine medicineName)
      Adds a new replenish request for a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      medicineName - The Medicine for which the replenish request is being added.

    • manageReplenish

      void manageReplenish(Scanner sc)
      Manages the replenish requests, allowing for review and processing of the requests.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.

    • submitReplenish

      void submitReplenish(Scanner sc, Pharmacist pharmacist, ReplenishManageInterface replenishManageInterface, InvenManageInterface invenManageInterface)
      Submits a replenish request for approval or further processing.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      pharmacist - The Pharmacist submitting the replenish request.
      replenishManageInterface - The ReplenishManageInterface that provides replenish management functions.
      invenManageInterface - The InvenManageInterface used for inventory management.
